entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
